1/2 cup packed light brown sugar,1/2 cup all purpose flour,1/4 cup unsalted butter, melted,1/4 teaspoon kosher salt,2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, divided,cooking spray,2 cups whole milk,1 cup heavy whipping cream,6 large eggs,2 tablespoons pure maple syrup, plus more for serving,1 1/2 tablespoons vanilla extract,1 (16- oz.) day-old brioche loaf, cut into 1-inch cubes,2 teaspoons granulated sugar,,
